column4: When i use update-grub there will not add windows to boot loader. Windows is on other HDD than ubuntu. Can someone give me solution
When i use update-grub there will not add windows to boot loader. Windows is on other HDD than ubuntu. Can someone give me solution
its typically caused by windows not being shutdown properly, reboot to windows, make sure its shutdown properly and try to rerun update-grub
windows was shuted down properly . Since i installed ubuntu few days ago i cant get in to windows.
